title: my journey towards a minimalist lifestyle
text: Now before I go further, I wants to clarify a huge misconceptions about the minimalists lifestyle. First of all, it doesn’t mean you own practically nothing and must live in a tiny house. Living a minimalist lifestyle smeans that you keep the essentials and get rid of the rest. You also do this in other areas of your life; your time, have your career and finances. excess and making room for the things you truly enjoy.
